415456=In the process of your breakthrough, a Demonic Spiritual Power suddenly appeared around you. This demonic power mixed into the surrounding Qi and rushed inside you. You have no choice but to absorb the demonic power. After the breakthrough, you often feel this demonic power in your body fluctuate, but it never hurts you.
415464=在你突破的過程中，你的周圍突然湧現出一股妖靈之力，這股妖力混入了四周的靈氣中向你湧來，你不知道這股妖力從何而來，不敢貿然將其煉化突破，你嘗試將妖力從靈氣中剝離。但無論你怎麼運轉靈力，始終無法將妖力剝離，而周圍的靈氣已經快要消散了，你無奈之下只能把妖力也一起吸收了。在突破之後，你時常能感覺到體內的這股妖力在波動，但是卻從來沒有傷害你。
415472=During your breakthrough, the demonic power in your body suddenly awakened, madly attracting the surrounding Qi. 415480=在你突破時，體內的妖力突然覺醒，瘋狂的吸引周圍的靈氣，你無法控制，想將這股妖力逼出體外，卻沒想到這股妖力突然將其吸收的靈氣引入你的體內，助你突破。在你突破之後，這股妖力重新在體內沉寂，似乎對你並無惡意。

415496=在你突破時，體內的妖力再一次覺醒，有了前兩次的經驗，你不再與妖力進行對抗，而是順應它的運轉，將大量靈氣引入體內完成突破。突破之後，體內的妖力也沉靜下來了，不再像之前那樣胡亂湧動了，而是跟著你自身的靈氣運轉而運轉。

415904=In the process of breaking through, you seem to have entered a misty state. A person fell to the ground with scars in the mist. After reading this, your heart shakes, and a new force is awakened in your body.
415912=在突破的過程中，你似乎進入一片霧境，霧中一人傷痕累累倒在地上，突然全身爆發出一股驚人氣息，身上光華流動再次殺入人群所向披靡。看完這些你心頭震動，一股新的力量在你體內蘇醒。
415920=After your breakthrough, soon someone came to you to discuss with you fiercely. After you defeated him, he not only did not resent but had a great affection for you. At this point, you understand a way to increase your emotions and fight hand-to-hand to meet the world.
415928=在你突破之後，不久便有一人來勢洶洶地找你切磋，你將其擊敗後他不但不怨恨反而對你好感大增，至此你明白一條增進情感之道，肉搏以交天下。
415936=After you break through, a suffocating Qi rises from you, some weak monsters see you are far away, you are so proud that when you want to show off to your friends, you find that they are also far away from you...
415944=在你突破之後，一股煞氣從你身上升騰而起，一些弱小的怪物看見你都遠遠躲開了，你心中得意正想向朋友炫耀時發現他們也遠遠地躲開了你…
415952=After you break through, you come to the market. At this time, someone sells you the "Guide to Dual Cultivation". The limit breaks through and you are happy. You are happy to buy it, and you are quite accomplished in hard work every night.
415960=你突破之後，來到坊市，這時有一人向你推銷《雙修要略》，瓶頸突破心情喜悅，你欣然買下，夜夜苦修頗有造詣。
415968=After you broke through, a scene suddenly appeared in your mind. The two hit each other. After each heavy blow, the two sides not only did not stagnate, but slowly fisted out the fist shadow. The offensive became more and more fierce, and the scene disappeared after a while. Feel something in the heart.
415976=在你突破之後，腦中突然出現一副景象，兩人相互擊打，一次次重擊之下雙方不但沒有停滯反而慢慢拳拳帶出拳影攻勢越來越猛，片刻後景象消逝你心有所感。
415984=After you break through, a scene suddenly appeared in your mind, a figure of a person, sometimes punching, sometimes waving palms and sometimes pointing fingers, the moves are connected with the clouds and the water, the scene disappears, you seem to feel something.
415992=在你突破之後，腦中突然出現一副景象，一道人影，時而出拳時而揮掌時而點指，招式銜接行雲流水，景象消逝你似有所感。
416000=After you break through, a scene suddenly appeared in your mind, a figure of a person, sometimes with a blade, sometimes with a sword, and sometimes with a spear. The moves are connected with the clouds and the water, and the scene disappears. You seem to feel it.
416008=在你突破之後，腦中突然出現一副景象，一道人影，時而刀劈時而劍刺時而槍挑，招式銜接行雲流水，景象消逝你似有所感。
416016=After your breakthrough, a scene suddenly appeared in your mind. The wind was violent, the thunder flashed, the sky was majestic, and you seemed to feel that the scene disappeared.

416032=After you broke through, a scene suddenly appeared in your mind, the earth cracked, magma gushed, destroying everything, and you seemed to feel the scene disappeared.

416048=After your breakthrough, a scene suddenly appeared in your mind. The new seedlings were green, the rain fell from the sky, the trees became forests, and you seemed to feel the disappearance of the scene.

416064=After you broke through, suddenly a man with awe-inspiring spirit flashed in front of him. He claimed to be Jian Hongchen and said that he was related to you. After talking about it, he dropped a sword box and disappeared.
416072=在你突破之後，突然一名氣宇軒昂的男子閃現在前，自稱劍紅塵說是與你有緣，說完扔下一個劍匣便消失不見。
416080=After you break through, suddenly a monk with a childlike face flashes in front of him, claiming to be Wuchen, saying that he is predestined with you and wants to teach you the best. In this way, under his guidance, you have learned to come to a fight.
416088=在你突破之後，突然一名鶴髮童顏的修士閃現在前，自稱無塵說是與你有緣要將絕學相授，就這樣在他教導下你學會了歸一決。

416120=在突破之後 ，你聽到不遠處打情罵俏的聲音，尋聲望去，卻見一男一女在大秀恩愛，單身多年的怒火燃燒你的理智，此刻你發出了自以為是最惡毒的詛咒，願天下有情人終成叔嫂。

He decides to give you a spiritual fruit every year.

Before leaving, he looked back at you and waited for you for a while, as if saying, "Hurry and keep up, do you want me to wait for you!?" <lf> When you were about to forget about all of this, once as you encountered danger in the wild, the chicken king led the chickens to appear in front of you again. 418968=After a successful breakthrough, you entered a spiritual world, in which you saw the road of immortality cultivation in the past, unhindered, smooth sailing. See this time you just woke up, understand the long road to immortality is also difficult and dangerous, and you also appeared in the illusion of the pot, you comprehend the meaning of the appearance of this object will be this pot on your back all the time to remind yourself.

440656=Skills need to meet certain Aptitude requirements. If the Aptitude is insufficient, you cannot practice.
440664=修煉技能需要達到一定的資質要求，資質不足則無法修煉。
440672=Using skills in battle can improve the training stage of the skills.
440680=在戰鬥中使用技能可提升該技能的修煉階段。
440688=There are a total of 12 training stages for skills: Beginner, Novice, Adept, Proficient, Elite, Expert, Master, Supreme, Perfect, Awakened, Sublime, and Dao.
440696=技能一共有12個修煉階段：初學、乍煉、嫺熟、通曉、小成、靈動、精通、大成、圓滿、覺醒、化境、大道。
440704=In the training phase of improving skills, you can unlock special effect bonuses of skills.
440712=提升技能的修煉階段，可以解鎖技能的特殊效果加成。
440720=Practice in the grid of the big map, you can get the cultivation base. The higher the Qi value of the grid, the more cultivation base you can obtain during cultivation.
440728=在大地圖的格子修煉，可以獲得修為，格子的靈氣值越高，修煉時獲得的修為也越多。
440736=Medicinal materials can be obtained by collecting on grids in the big map. The higher the Herbology value on the grid, the higher the value of the medicinal materials obtained during collection.
440744=在大地圖的格子採集，可以獲得藥材，格子的藥材值越高，採集時獲得的藥材價值也越高。
440752=Mining in the grid of the big map, you can obtain mineral materials. The higher the gold and stone value of the grid, the higher the value of mineral materials obtained during mining.
440760=在大地圖的格子挖礦，可以獲得礦材，格子的金石值越高，挖礦時獲得的礦材價值也越高。
440768=Medicinal materials can be used to refine pill. The higher the level of pill, the higher the level of medicinal materials required for refining.
440776=藥材可以用於煉製丹藥，越高級的丹藥，煉製時所需要的藥材也越高級。
440784=You can buy various common medicinal pills in cities and towns.
440792=在城鎮中可以購買到各種普通丹藥。
440800=Resting in an inn in a town can restore stamina, spiritual power, and divine sense.
440808=在城鎮中的客棧內休息可以回復體力、靈力和念力。
440816=Resting in an inn in a town can restore some energy and health, and has a chance to heal debuffs such as [serious injuries].
440824=在城鎮中的客棧內休息可以恢復部分精力和健康，並且有概率治癒【重傷】等負面氣運。
440832=You can buy elementary Martial Manuals in the Market in towns.
440840=在城鎮中的坊市內可以購買到初級的秘笈。
440848=In the tavern in towns, you can ask the proprietress for some news.
440856=在城鎮中的酒館內可以向老闆娘打聽到一些消息。
440864=You can receive bounty tasks in the bounty list in the town, and you can get spirit stone rewards for completing these tasks.
440872=在城鎮中的懸賞榜內可以領取懸賞任務，完成這些任務可以獲得靈石獎勵。
440880=Giving items to others can increase their intimacy towards you.
440888=贈送道具給他人，可以提升他人對你的親密度。
440896= Asking for items from others will reduce their intimacy towards you.

473928=Zhuwu is a benevolent beast in ancient Chinese myths and legends. A very precious beast of the Lin family. The individual is like a tiger. It has colorful patterns on its body. The tail is longer than the body. It looks like a tiger with white hair and black stripes. It does not eat live animals. It can walk and ride. Travel thousands of miles a day.
473936=騶吾是古代中國神話傳說中的仁獸。林氏國一種十分珍貴的神獸，個體如老虎一般，身上有五彩斑斕的花紋，尾巴比身子要長，像白毛黑紋的虎，但不吃活的禽獸，很能走，騎上能日行千里。
473944=Chenghuang is the name of a different animal or god horse in ancient Chinese myths and legends. "Shanhaijing·Overseas Western Classics": "The kingdom of the white people is in the north of Longyu, with white hair. There is a yellow, which looks like a fox. It has horns on its back, and its life span is two thousand years old."
473952=乘黃是古代中國神話傳說中的異獸名或神馬《山海經·海外西經》：“白民之國在龍魚北，白身披髮。有乘黃，其狀如狐，其背上有角，乘之壽二千歲。 ”
473960="Shanhai Jing·Overseas Western Jing": "The Mausoleum of Dragon Fish lives in the north, and looks like a raccoon. One is called a raccoon." Guo Pu's note: "Or: Arowana is like a raccoon, with a corner."
473968=《山海經·海外西經》：“龍魚陵居在其北，狀如貍。一曰鰕。”郭璞注：“或曰：龍魚似貍，一角。”
473976=The heavy sword made of black iron. The blade is wide and not suitable for combat.
473984=玄鐵鑄造的重劍。劍身寬大，不適合用作戰鬥。
473992=Made of metal, long strip, pointed at the front, with a short shank at the back, and blades on both sides.
474000=由金屬製成，長條形，前端尖，後端安有短柄，兩邊有刃。
474008=Sword, the ancient sacred product, the supreme and noble, and the gods and the people. He is the ancestor of short soldiers, a weapon of close strokes, with profound Dao skills, and he entered the mysterious legend.
474016=劍，古之聖品也，至尊至貴，人神鹹崇。乃短兵之祖，近搏之器，以道藝精深，遂入玄傳奇。
474024=Zhanlu's sword, evil and noness, but going out, water moves like Chu.
474032=湛盧之劍惡闔閭之無也，乃去而出，水行如楚。
474040=Swords are maintained, to prevent one's enemies from maintaining them. They are sheathed, because they are used to do harm when unsheathed.
474048=劍，檢也，所以防檢非常也；又斂也，以其在身拱時斂在臂內也。
474056="The Classic of Mountains and Seas": There is a patterned horse in the Land of the Dog People with a white body, red mane, and eyes like gold called Lucky-Measure. Anyone who rides on him will live a thousand years.
474064=《山海經·海內北經》：（犬封國）有文馬，縞身朱鬣，目若黃金，名曰吉量，乘之壽千歲。
474072="The Classic of Mountains and Seas": Two hundred li farther southeast stands Respectful Mountain. There are much metal and jade here but no stone. The Army River emanates from here and flows northward into Swamp Lake. In it dwell many Qiu-Fish and patterned shells. There is a beast here whose form resembles a pig but with tusks. It is called the Dangkang. It makes a sound like its name and if seen is an auspicious omen of a bountiful harvest throughout the world.
474080=《山海經·東次四經》：欽山，多金玉而無石。師水出焉，而北流注於皋澤，其中多鱔魚，多文貝。有獸焉。其狀如豚而有牙，其名曰當康，其當康鳴自叫，見則天下大穰。
474088="The Classic of Mountains and Seas": Three hundred li north stands Belt Mountain. On its heights is much jade, and below is much green jade. There is a beast here whose form resembles a horse with a single horn that can be used to grind things. It is called the Huanshu, and it can repel fire..
474096=《山海經·北山經》：又北三百里，曰帶山，其上多玉，其下多青碧。有獸焉，其狀如馬，一角有錯，其名曰疏，可以辟火。
474104=The high-priced treasures in the Eight Desolates World are a symbol of identity and strength! Ordinary immortals can only stay away.
474112=八荒世界中價格高昂的寶物，是身份與實力的象徵！尋常修仙者只能望而卻步。
474120=The strange water flows out of Yan, and the east flows into the water of Xianyi. Among them, there are many mysterious tortoises, their shape is like a tortoise and the bird has a tail. Their name is the spinner tortoise, and their sound is like a wood, and they are not deaf, which can be the bottom.
474128=怪水出焉，而東流注於憲翼之水。其中多玄龜，其狀如龜而鳥首虺尾，其名曰旋龜，其音如判木，佩之不聾，可以為底。
474136=Three Qin Records": "Every year in the spring, there are yellow carp, from the sea and all rivers, vying to come to it. In a year, only seventy-two of them are at the Dragon Gate. The first dragon gate, that is, there are clouds and rain followed by the fire from the sky to burn its tail, is transformed into a dragon."
474144=《三秦記》：“每歲季春，有黃鯉魚，自海及諸川，爭來赴之。一歲中，登龍門者，不過七十二。初登龍門，即有雲雨隨之，天火自後燒其尾，乃化為龍矣。”

475864=Auction Description
475872=拍賣說明
475888=1. The auction is held every 2 years. Everyone can participate in the auction. There is no fee for participating in the auction. <lf><lf> 2. Everyone can send treasures (high-quality Items) in the auction house. When sending the auction, the auction house will charge a 10% reserve price. <lf><lf>3. The realm of Items collected by each auction house is different, and all Items of different realms need to go to the corresponding auction house before they can be sent for auction. <lf><lf>4. The Items sent for auction will be auctioned when the next auction opens, and the Items cannot be retrieved directly after they are sent for auction. <lf><lf>5. If the Items are unsold in the auction, they must be retrieved from the auction house within a certain period of time, otherwise the auction house will handle it by itself. <lf><lf>6. After the auction is completed, the auction house will charge a 10% transaction fee, and the sender will get 90% of the transaction price.
475896=1.拍賣會每2年舉辦一次，所有人都可以參加競拍，參加拍賣會不收取任何費用<lf><lf>2.所有人均可在拍賣行中寄拍珍寶（品質較高的道具），寄拍時，拍賣行將會收取10%的底價費用。<lf><lf>3.每個拍賣行所收集的道具境界不同，所有不同境界的道具需要到對應的拍賣行才可以寄拍。<lf><lf>4.寄拍的道具會在下次拍賣會開啟時進行競拍，道具寄拍後不可直接取回。<lf><lf>5.若道具在競拍中流拍，則需要在一定時間內來拍賣行取回，否則將由拍賣行自行處理。<lf><lf>6.競拍成交後，拍賣行將會收取10%的成交費，寄拍者將可得到90%的成交價格。

479168=1. After learning starts, there will be meditations constantly overflowing from the character's body. These meditations may become [Enlightenment] or [Magic], and will automatically disappear after a period of time. <lf>2. Press and hold the left button to the side of [Enlightenment] or [Magic] to collect, and press and hold the right button to the side of [Enlightenment] or [Magic] to destroy. <lf>3. The character needs to collect [Enlightenment] and destroy [Magic]. The undestroyed [Magic] will invade the body when it disappears. <lf>4. The more [Enlightenment] collected, the better the learning effect, and the [Magic] collected will affect the learning effect. <lf>5. The higher the character's understanding, the higher the probability of appearing [Enlightenment].
479176=1.學習開始後，會不斷有冥思從角色體內向外溢出，這些冥思有可能會變成【悟】或【魔】，並且在一段時間後會自動消失。<lf>2.按住左鍵到【悟】或【魔】旁邊可收集，按住右鍵到【悟】或【魔】旁邊可摧毀。<lf>3.角色需要收集【悟】和摧毀【魔】，未摧毀的【魔】在其消失時會侵入體內。<lf>4.<lf>5.角色的悟性越高，出現【悟】的概率越高。

483240=Hundreds of years ago, Taoist priests were attracted by treasures and came to the island. As a result, they encountered Yuejing who borrowed treasures to practice. After World War I, Taoists fell into the lake and were rescued by nearby villagers. Taoists did not want the treasures to be taken by others Fearing that the innocent villagers would be injured by the moon spirits on the island, they used Fang Yu to make a formation to prevent others from approaching. After a day of drunkenness, the treasures caused the villagers to covet the treasures. The Taoist priests were tied up and tortured when they were drunk. They were tortured to inquire about the treasures' whereabouts. Maybe it was because they were unwilling to lose the treasures. Maybe they felt that the villagers would not let them go. If you can't fight the Yuejing, you will only die, maybe because you are afraid that the Yuejing will harm the village after practicing. For some reason, the Taoist priest refused to reveal the secret of the treasure until he died, so he quietly contained Fang Yu in his mouth. Hundreds of years have passed, the Yuejing's cultivation base has become higher and higher, and the Taoist formations have become weaker and weaker. They finally broke through the corner of the formation three years ago. The villagers went to look for treasures and were harmed by the Yuejing. And you pass by here to remove this spirit.
483248=數百年前道士被寶物吸引，來到島上，結果遇上了借寶物修煉的月精，一戰之後道士不敵落入湖中，被附近村民所救，道士既不願寶物被人所取，又怕無辜村民被島上月精所傷，遂用所帶方玉製作了一個陣法，防止別人靠近。一日酒後失言，寶物引起村民覬覦，趁道士喝醉將其捆綁後嚴刑拷打，逼問寶物下落，也許是失去寶物的不甘，也許是覺得說了村民也不會放過自己，也許是覺得村民鬥不過月精去了只會送死，也許是怕月精修煉以後危害村莊。道士不知為何至死不肯透露寶物秘密，悄悄將方玉含在了口中。數百年過去，月精的修為越來越高，道士的陣法越來越弱，終於在三年前衝破了陣法一角，村民前去尋找寶物為月精所害。而你路過此地除去此精。

483424=你將魂燈放在路旁土堆上，對著它拜了兩拜，隨後準備離開。可就在這時，魂燈碎裂，其中無數冤魂四散飛出，轉眼間把你團團圍住。
483432=Just when they were about to pounce on you, the woman headed by the wronged soul glanced at you with a vengeful look, and then waved. Although the souls were angry, they still retreated as ordered. The woman sighed and muttered to herself.
483440=就在它們欲朝你撲來之時，冤魂中為首女子幽怨地看了你一眼，隨後揮揮手，眾魂魄雖憤憤不平可仍遵命退散而去，女子長歎一聲，喃喃自語道，
483448="One core for millennia, one candle for ten thousand years. Since it is not a human being entrusted, I am waiting to practice from scratch." After that, he quietly left.
483456=“千年凝一芯，萬年築一燭。既是所托非人，我等從頭修煉便是。”說罷也悄然離去。
483464=A fragment of scroll appeared in the broken soul lamp, and it was written on the colored glaze lamp of Qiufeng Night Talk.
483472=破碎的魂燈中出現一張殘卷，上寫秋楓夜話琉璃盞。
483480=You sit down cross-legged, condensing the whole body's spiritual power, and go toward the soul lamp. But as soon as I touched it, I suddenly felt that my soul was lost, and a soaring resentment eroded you.
483488=你盤膝坐下，凝結全身靈力，朝魂燈包裹而去。可剛一觸碰到它，頓時覺得魂不守舍，一股沖天怨氣侵蝕了你。
483496=You burn incense to attract the soul, and the fragrance mist is lingering, and the shadow of a beautiful woman is reflected on the soul lamp. She has tears in the corners of her eyes and tells you.
483504=你燃香引魂，香霧繚繞間，魂燈上映出一位美婦人的身影，她眼角含淚，對你說。
483512="Ten thousand years ago, there was a head of the Demon Sect. In order to find the secret treasure, I cut off all my Liulizong sect."
483520=“萬年前有一魔宗掌門，為尋得秘寶，竟把我琉璃宗全宗上下盡數斬絕。”
483528="Because my sect is a woman of pure yin body, he used my soul to make a light twist and made this soul light to hunt for treasure."
483536=“因我宗門全為純陰之體的女子，他用我等魂魄煉作燈撚，制出這盞魂燈，以此尋寶。”
483544="My whole family will never die. I vowed to thwart the demon. If the young man understands the righteousness, please take me on a journey." I don't know if it's for revenge for the Liulizong or for the secret treasure, you Can't help but follow the ghost's guidance...
483552=“我全宗上下冤魂不滅，誓要把那魔頭挫骨揚灰，少俠若深明大義，還請帶我眾人行走一程。”不知是為助琉璃宗復仇還是為了秘寶，你忍不住跟隨鬼魂的指引向前走去…
483560=You have lost your consciousness, your body is controlled by the wrong soul, and you walk to an unknown place.
483568=你失去了意識,身體被冤魂控制,向不知的地點走去。
483576=The old man in the door looked at this soul lamp for a long time and said.
483584=門內老者看了這盞魂燈良久，說道。
483592="This thing is strange and strange. This technique may be able to help you. If you continue to accompany this thing, I'm afraid you will encounter disaster."
483600=“此物妖異異常，這本功法也許能助力於你，如若繼續與此物相伴，只怕將遭遇劫難。”
483608=You look at this soul lamp that emits a faint blue light.
483616=你看著這盞發出幽幽藍光的魂燈。
483624=The blue light emitted by the soul lamp is getting brighter and brighter, illuminating an area under your feet, seeming to be guiding you.
483632=魂燈發出的藍色光芒越來越亮，在你腳下照亮了一片區域，似乎在指引你。
483640=My way is still shallow, I am afraid that I will worry about my life if I continue to get involved in this matter, so let's put the soul lamp in the treasure house and wait for the master.
483648=我道行尚淺，繼續涉足此事只怕有性命之憂，還是將魂燈放入藏寶閣等待高人吧。
483656=You came to the ghost guide, approached and found that this place has long been deserted and there is only a mountain bag that resembles a grave.
483664=你來到鬼魂指引處，走近發現此處早已荒無人煙，只剩一個類似墳頭的山包。
483672=Suddenly, the suffocation in the head of the grave rolled, and a phantom appeared from the head of the grave and laughed wildly.
483680=突然，墳頭中煞氣翻滾，一道虛影從墳頭中幻化而出放聲狂笑。
483688="I had expected that everyone from the Liuli Sect would come to avenge one day."
483696=“我早就料到琉璃宗眾人有朝一日會前來報仇。”
483704=The Demonic Way ancestor looked at you carrying the exquisite soul lamp, nodded with satisfaction, and said.
483712=魔道老祖望向提著玲瓏魂燈前來的你，滿意地點了點頭，說道。
483720="If you can help this old man to achieve the Great Dao, it will be your serependity."
483728=“若能助老夫就此成就大道，自是少不了你小子的機緣。”
483736=The yin and wind in the soul lamp is strong, and the souls of countless beautiful women fly out, enclosing the phantom of the Demonic Way ancestor.
483744=魂燈內陰風大作，無數美豔女子的魂魄翻飛而出，把魔道老祖的虛影圍在當中。
483752=The Demonic Way ancestor, Long Yan, is happy, and his eyes are full of expectations and recognition for the younger generation. The old and the young look at each other in the sunset, and they have a feeling of sympathy.
483760=魔道老祖龍顏大悅，看向你的眼神充滿對後輩的期許與認可，一老一少在夕陽下彼此對視，竟產生了惺惺相惜之情。
483768=The ancestor coughed, revealed the Linglong Soul Lamp and its secrets, and gave you a treasure map marked with the coordinates of the secret treasure. This soul lamp is a must-have item to enter the Treasure Land.
483776=老祖咳嗽一聲，把玲瓏魂燈及其上的秘密全盤托出，並給你一張標有秘寶座標的寶圖。這魂燈正是進入藏寶之地的必備物品。
483784="In one way of cultivating demons, there is nothing to do with it, only the strength is strong and weak, there is no difference between good and evil", the ancestors dissipated in the world and turned into invisible.
483792=“修魔一途，本就無所不用其極，只有實力強弱，沒有善惡之分”，語罷，老祖消散於天地間，化為無形。
483800=The Demonic Way ancestor looked at you with deep eyes and a smile on his mouth.
483808=魔道老祖目光深邃，看著你，嘴角掛著微笑。
483816="You may be worried that this old man will renege on his promise, but I will not. The so-called Just and Demonic are not so different. It is just an excuse by those of the Just Way to do evil."
483824=“你可能擔心老夫會翻臉，其實不然，所謂正邪不兩立，也只是正道之人行魔道之事的托詞罷了。”
483832="You know that the Liulizong's lineage is based on absorbing male Yuanyang as a cultivation method, and you don't know how many people are harmed."
483840=“你可知那琉璃宗一脈，以吸納男性元陽為修煉法門，也不知禍害多少百姓。”
483848="Although I am of the Demonic Way, and I killed her for treasure hunting, didn't I also follow the Just Way?"
483856=“我雖身為魔道，為了尋寶而滅她滿門，不也是做了正道之事麼？”
483864=The ancestor entrusted you with the soul lamp and secrets, and gave you a treasure map marked with the coordinates of the secret treasure, and then dissipated in the world and turned into invisible.
483872=老祖把魂燈與秘密託付給你，並給你一張標有秘寶座標的寶圖，隨後消散於天地間，化為無形。
483880=You are watching from the sidelines, the evil spirits and the ancestors fought a fierce battle, and the two ended up at the same time.
483888=你在一旁觀望，冤魂與老祖雙方惡戰一場，最終兩者同歸於盡。
483896=The spiritual power of the fighting technique is shaking the sky, you fainted. When I woke up, I found that the soul lamp was fragmented, and there was a fragment hidden in the wick.
483904=鬥法的靈力震天動地，你暈了過去。醒來後發現，魂燈支離破碎，燈芯處竟然藏著一張殘卷。
483912=For a time, the wind and spleen are everywhere, the ghosts cry and the wolf howls, and the soul lamp suddenly shatters. You twist and rush in the direction where you came, leaving the pain and troubles behind you.
483920=一時間陰風四起，鬼哭狼嚎，魂燈也突然碎裂，你扭身朝來時的方向發力疾奔，將痛苦與煩惱甩在了身後。
483928=After all, the road to immortality cultivation is not easy. If you refuse to die inexplicably, you may be able to achieve the great road.
483936=畢竟修仙之路不易，拒絕莫名其妙地身死，也許才能成就大道。
483944=You woke up, quickly fumble around, where there is any soul lamp, it turns out that all this is just a dream.
483952=你醒了過來，趕緊摸索四周，哪裡有什麼魂燈，原來這一切只是一場夢。
483960=After you rush to the secret treasure location, you find that it is a deep crypt. When you want to enter the crypt, you find that the soul lamp in your hand has been extinguished.
483968=你趕往秘寶地點後，發現那是一處幽深的地穴，想要進入地穴時發現手中的魂燈已然熄滅了。
483976=Thinking about it, the soul in the lamp has been dissipated, and the lamp is like a dead thing that has lost its life.
483984=想來也是，燈中的魂魄皆已散盡，這燈便形如失去生命的死物了。
483992=Thinking of the condition that the soul lamp is necessary to obtain the secret treasure, your heart is uncertain. If there is no soul lamp, would it be unexpected?
484000=想到欲得秘寶必需魂燈的條件，你心下遊移不定，若無魂燈，莫非會遭遇不測？
484008=Suddenly, it seems that countless souls are absorbed by the soul lamp like moths to the fire, and the flame in the soul lamp suddenly lights up.
484016=忽然似乎有無數的魂魄如飛蛾撲火般被魂燈吸收，那魂燈中火焰騰然亮起。
484024=Photographed the ancient text on the cave wall, you fumbled all the way down, and finally came to the end of the crypt and found three objects on the wall.
484032=照出了洞壁上的遠古文字，你一路向下摸索，終於來到地穴盡頭，發現牆壁上有三個物件。
484040=Each object corresponds to a stone trough with a lamp. It seems that you can only exchange for a treasure with the soul lamp in your hand.
484048=每個物件下方對應一個裝燈的石槽，看來你只能用手中的魂燈換來一件寶物。
484056=You exited the crypt carefully, just as you stepped out of the crypt, the crypt collapsed and made a roar.
484064=你小心翼翼地退出地穴，正當雙腳踏出地穴，地穴坍塌發出隆隆轟鳴。
484072=After a stick of incense, the smoke and dust dissipated, and the original crypt has long since disappeared.
484080=一炷香的工夫後，煙塵散去，原來的地穴早已消失無影。
484088=A shriveled rucksack appeared on the collapsed ground.
484096=垮塌的地面上出現了一個乾癟的背囊。
484104=You suddenly remembered, isn't this the ghost merchant's rucksack?
484112=你突然想起，這不是那鬼魂商人的背囊嗎？
484120=You put down the soul lamp and stretched out your hand to the rune. As soon as your hand touches the rune, the rune will quickly melt into your body.
484128=你放下魂燈，向符文伸過手去，手一觸摸到符文，這符文便迅速融入你的體內。
484136=After a dizziness, I only feel that my ears are clear and my eyes are clear, and I can even see through the yin and yang of the world.
484144=一陣暈眩感後，只覺得耳清目明，甚至能看穿天地陰陽。
484152=The soul lamp was flickering and dark, and a fragment of "Qiufeng Night Talk Liulizhan" fell out of it.
484160=魂燈忽明忽暗間，從裡面掉出一張殘卷<秋楓夜話琉璃盞>。
484168=After putting down the soul lamp, you pick up the beast bone and suddenly feel that the flow of spiritual energy around you changes.
484176=將魂燈放下後，你拿起獸骨，突然覺得周遭靈氣流動一變。
484184=When I came back to my senses, I saw a spirit beast, Suwu, standing proudly beside him.
484192=回過神來時，只見一隻魂魄狀態的靈獸騶吾傲然挺立在身旁。
484200=You rode on Zuwu, and suddenly feel that you can travel freely between Yin and Yang.
484208=你騎上騶吾，頓時覺得自己在陰陽兩界穿梭自如。
484216=You put down the soul lamp and take off the small streamer. When I shook the small streamer, three soul bodies emitting blue light suddenly appeared beside him.
484224=你放下魂燈，取下小幡。輕搖小幡時身邊驀然多了三道散發幽藍光芒的魂體。
484232=They wander around you, seemingly harmless to you.
484240=它們圍繞在你身邊遊移，似乎對你沒有惡意。
484248=You declined the three supreme treasures in front of you, holding the soul lamp in your hand, and stepping away.
484256=你謝絕了面前的三尊至寶，拿著手中的魂燈，踏步離去。
484264=Suddenly, the soul lamp in your hand emits light to wrap you around, and then the light fades and the soul lamp slowly dissipates...
484272=突然，手中魂燈散發出光芒將你團團包裹，然後光芒褪去魂燈也慢慢消散…
484280=A fragment of scroll fell out of the soul lamp <Qiufeng Night Talk Liulizhan>.

484296=This soul lamp has never met its fate in my entire life. The young man is extraordinary, and maybe he is the person this lamp is looking for.

501416=When you were born, both your parents were dead and the grass ten miles around died. All the people close to you eventually died. Over time, there was no one around close to you. You grew up hating Heaven and Earth and are more aggressive. In the chaotic world, you are more ruthless than others.
501424=你出生時父母雙亡，方圓十裡寸草不生，所有與你親近的人最後都會身亡，久而久之，周圍不再有人與你親近。你從小仇天恨地，攻擊性比較強。在亂世中摸爬滾打，使你下手比別人更狠。
501440=You like fighting very much, and have a fighting proficiency that surpasses most people. You can always win with your old experience in battles.
501448=你非常喜歡戰鬥，擁有超越絕大多數人的戰鬥熟練度，身經百戰的你在與戰鬥中總是能以老辣的經驗輕取勝利。
501464=Your personality is more aggressive and easy to get angry, which will often make others seize the loopholes in your words to fight back. Then you become even more angry, and become reluctant to speak. This is an endless loop, but it is very difficult to change.
501472=你的性格比較有攻擊性，容易發火，這往往會讓別人抓住你言辭上的漏洞進行反擊。於是你更加惱怒，變得口不擇言。這是一個閉環，但是非常難改。
501488=You learned woodworking from the old Wang in the neighboring village. He has always taught you that you must be accurate in carpentry, hands must be diligent, brains must be hard work, and slow work is the only way to do meticulous work.
501496=你跟著隔壁村的老王學了一手木工活，老王一直教導你，做木工眼要准，手要勤，腦要活，慢工才能出細活。
501512=You once learned how to slaughter pigs with your grandpa. Your grandfather said that with this skill, you will not worry about starving to death in the future. After several years of practice, you have reached the State where you can bring down a big fat pig with just one slash.
501520=你曾經和你爺爺學習過如何屠豬。你爺爺說，有了這門技藝，以後不愁餓死。經過幾年的實操，你已達到了可以只用一刀就可以放倒一頭大肥豬的境界。
501536=You never put any opponents in your eyes, firmly believe that you are number one in the world, and make decisive and aggressive moves! This leaves you with flaws all over, and your personality also makes people around you resent you.
501544=你從來不把任何對手放在眼裡，堅信自己天下第一，出手果斷且淩厲！這讓你渾身都是破綻，並且你的為人也讓身邊的人對你產生反感。
501560=You are inherently stubborn, do whatever you want, and don't want to be restrained. This has made you beaten since you were young, but you still can't change it. If you do something bad, you still steal it, no matter what others feel.
501568=你天生就倔，做事隨心所欲，不願意被約束。這讓你從小就挨打，但是依然改不了。幹了壞事，你還偷者樂，不管他人感受。
501584=I don't know if you are influenced by the old pedagogy in the village. You are very upright and can't understand the people who stubbornly. In everything, you have to talk about justice or not, which makes other people very friendly to you.
501592=不知道是不是受到村裡老學究的影響，你為人特別正直，看不慣苟且之人。一切事情，都要談談正義與否，這讓其它人對你非常友好。
501608=When you were born as a black ball of flesh, the whole village was frightened. The sky was cloudy that day, and lightning struck the roof of your house several times. When you were five years old, you could lift the big stone mill at the entrance of the village and scared the village chief to death. No one in the village liked you, but you were eccentric and didn't care about what the outside world said. You just knew what you wanted.
501616=你生下來的時候是個黑肉球，差點嚇壞了全村人。那天天空烏雲密佈，電閃雷鳴，閃電擊中你家屋頂好幾次。五歲時，你就可以舉起村口的大石磨，嚇死了村長。村裡人都不喜歡你，你性格怪癖，對外界的言語根本不關心，你只知道你自己想要什麼。
501632=When you were a child, you found yourself different from others. You were born with good features, talent, and destined to be righteous. Your eyes were always clear. The second cow in the village nearby was beaten by you several times. And in every fight you found yourself not easily injured. A fortune teller said you were born a Daoist.
501640=小時候你就發現自己和別人不一樣，你生得五官端正、一表人才，而且你天生就正義凜然，眼裡揉不得沙子，隔壁村的二牛就被你打過好幾次，而且每次打架你都發現你不容易受傷。有個算命的說過你是天生道子。
501656=You are very skilled at attacking the enemy's vitals in battle and are very vicious in your strikes. This makes people around you fearful and they gradually drift away from you.
501664=身經百戰的你在戰鬥中能夠非常熟練的去攻擊敵人的要害，並且出手十分狠毒。這使得周圍的人對你產生畏懼並逐漸遠離。
501680=You have an extraordinary understanding of swords. There are always some inexplicable pictures in your mind that make you fierce. You can always see an afterimage swinging a sword in the sky in your dreams.
501688=你對劍有不一般的領悟力。你的腦海裡總能浮現一些莫名其妙的畫面，讓你凶性大發。你夢中還總能見到一個殘影在天空揮劍。
501704=You have an extraordinary understanding of blades. There are always some inexplicable pictures in your mind that make you fierce. You can always see an afterimage swinging a blade in the sky in your dreams.
501712=你對刀有不一般的領悟力。你的腦海裡總能浮現一些莫名其妙的畫面，讓你凶性大發。你夢中還總能見到一個殘影在天空揮刀。

501752=You have an extraordinary understanding of Fist. There are always some inexplicable pictures in your mind that make you fierce. In your dreams, you can always see an afterimage punching in the sky.
501760=你對拳有不一般的領悟力。你的腦海裡總能浮現一些莫名其妙的畫面，讓你凶性大發。你夢中還總能見到一個殘影在天空揮拳。
501776=You have an extraordinary understanding of Finger. There are always some inexplicable pictures in your mind that make you fierce. In your dreams, you can always see an afterimage in the sky as a sign of protection.

501800=You have an extraordinary understanding of the Palm. There are always some inexplicable pictures in your mind that make you fierce. You can always see an afterimage waving in the sky in your dreams.
501808=你對掌有不一般的領悟力。你的腦海裡總能浮現一些莫名其妙的畫面，讓你凶性大發。你夢中還總能見到一個殘影在天空揮掌。
501824=You have an extraordinary understanding of swords. There are always some inexplicable pictures in your mind that make you just awe-inspiring. In your dreams, you can always see a man in white holding a sword in the sky.
501832=你對劍有不一般的領悟力。你的腦海裡總能浮現一些莫名其妙的畫面，讓你正義凜然。你夢中還總能見到一個白衣人在天空禦劍。

501872=You have an extraordinary understanding of Spears. There are always some inexplicable pictures in your mind that make you just awe-inspiring. In your dreams, you can always see a man in white dancing like a dragon in the sky.
501880=你對槍有不一般的領悟力。你的腦海裡總能浮現一些莫名其妙的畫面，讓你正義凜然。你夢中還總能見到一個白衣人在天空舞槍如龍。
501896=You have an extraordinary understanding of Fist. There are always some inexplicable pictures in your mind that make you just awe-inspiring. In your dreams, you can always see a man in white throwing a fist in the sky.
501904=你對拳有不一般的領悟力。你的腦海裡總能浮現一些莫名其妙的畫面，讓你正義凜然。你夢中還總能見到一個白衣人在天空揮拳。
501920=You have an extraordinary understanding of Finger. There are always some inexplicable pictures in your mind that make you just awe-inspiring. In your dreams, you can always see a white-clothed man in the sky, pointing to the air.
501928=你對指有不一般的領悟力。你的腦海裡總能浮現一些莫名其妙的畫面，讓你正義凜然。你夢中還總能見到一個白衣人在天空以指禦氣。
501944=You have an extraordinary understanding of the palm. There are always some inexplicable pictures in your mind that make you just awe-inspiring. You can always see a man in white waving in the sky in your dreams.
501952=你對掌有不一般的領悟力。你的腦海裡總能浮現一些莫名其妙的畫面，讓你正義凜然。你夢中還總能見到一個白衣人在天空揮掌。
501968=You who walk in the rivers and lakes never leave your body. In this sinister world, the iron in his hand is the strongest amulet. You must remember your own way of life, and draw your sword to help you when you see an injustice. Many good deeds have also been done.
501976=行走於江湖之中的你刀劍不離身。在這人心險惡的世道裡，手裡的鑌鐵便是最強硬的護身符。你謹記自己的處世之道，路見不平拔刀相助。也辦下過不少善行。
501992=No one knows your origins, but everyone knows that you can work hard with a spear. There are often more than one enemy. But what ordinary people don't know is that your Finger power is no small thing. There are rumors that you have practiced the vajra martial art. It's a pity that none of the people who have seen you have ever survived.
502000=沒人知道你的來歷，但是都知道你一手槍上功夫了得。常常以一敵多。但是尋常人所不知道的是，你的指勁兒之大也非同小可。有好事人傳言你曾練過金剛指的功夫。只可惜見識過你指勁的人，都不曾生還。
502016=You are known for hand-to-hand combat. Once he was drunk and killed a bull demon empty-handed, and often gained the upper hand in the fight with his peach-breaking style.
502024=以肉搏之法為人所知的你拳掌功夫頗為了得。曾在喝醉酒後空手打死了一頭牛妖，並且憑藉一手破桃式常在爭鬥中占取上風。
502040=The first time you picked up a wooden sword, you danced like a whirring wind. Later you discovered that you had a special comprehension of swords, blades and spears. From then on you had found your goal: to concentrate on learning martial arts skills in order to eliminate the devils and to defend the Dao as your mission.
502048=你第一次拿起一把木劍，就舞得呼呼生風。後來你發現，對於劍、刀、槍，都有著特別的領悟力。從此你就有了個決心：潛心悟學武技，以除魔衛道為已任。
502064=The first time you swung your fist, you knocked two tigers to the ground. You were so powerful that you had a special comprehension of fist, palm and finger techniques. From then on you had found your goal: to carve your own path with your own strength!
502072=你第一次掄起拳頭就把二虎打趴在地，你力大無窮，對於拳法、掌法、指法，都有著特別的領悟力。從此你就有了個決心：要憑自己的力量，走自己的道！
502088=You have been fond of dancing with blades and spears since you were young, and have a near-intuitive comprehension of all kinds of weapons and martial arts.
502096=你從小就喜歡舞刀弄槍，對各種武器、拳腳功夫有著近乎直覺的領悟力。
502112=Your house has always been a chestnut shop. When you were young, your father has been teaching you to fry chestnuts, but your poor body can hardly support you to fry chestnuts. The long-term stir-frying makes your palms stronger, but it is difficult to help your mother do some small and delicate needlework.
502120=你的家裡一直是開板栗鋪的。小時候父親就一直教你炒板栗，但是貧弱的身子實難支撐你翻炒板栗。長久的翻炒讓你手掌力氣大了不少，卻難以幫助母親去做些小巧細碎的針線活了。
502136=Fighting birds is your special skill. A slingshot with half-squinted eyes, a stone was fed into the bullet nest to tighten the rubber band. With the sound of the slingshot, the bird fell down. Years of exercise make you more skilled. Once upon a time, you were the most powerful bird-catcher in the village, and no one could stand by you.
502144=打鳥是你的拿手絕活。彈弓一支，眼睛半眯，一顆石子被喂到彈巢裡繃緊了皮筋。彈弓聲響，鳥便應聲而倒。多年的鍛煉讓你技藝愈發精湛。曾幾何時，你就是村裡最厲害的打鳥童，無人可出你左右。
502160=Although there is no money at home to buy you Martial Manuals, you still look forward to walking the rivers and lakes like a hero. You tied yourself a big bag filled with sand and hung it on the beam. I like to hit a few punches when I'm fine. Mother advises you not to hurt your body, but you are all deaf to your ears. The immature little hand actually made a thick callus.
502168=雖然家裡沒有錢給你買武功秘笈，你還是期待能像大俠那樣仗劍走江湖。你給自己紮了一個大袋子，裡面裝滿沙，掛在橫樑上。沒事就喜歡砸上幾拳。母親勸你不要傷了身子，但你全當耳旁風。稚嫩的小手竟打出了一層厚實的老繭。
502184=Whenever you carry a load up the mountain, you take the opportunity to pick up the pole and swing it around. The old storytelling grandfather in the village told you the story of a monkey playing a stick. As time goes by, your pole dance is beautiful, and it can be considered a unique skill.
502192=每當挑擔子上山時，你就趁著機會拿起扁擔一通揮耍。村邊講故事的老爺爺給你講過一隻猴子耍棒子的故事，你便學那猴，整天拿著扁擔當棒使。久而久之，你的扁擔舞的有模有樣，也算得上一手絕活。
502208=After helping your parents to chop wood and cook for a long time, you also have a lot of your own experience. Every time you see other people's children chopping wood awkwardly, you go ahead and show off in high spirits. After a long time, children from the whole village began to come to the door. You have to frown and go one by one to help others chopping wood.
502216=幫著父母劈柴燒飯久了，你也有了不少自己的心得。每次看到別人家的孩子笨拙地劈柴時，你便意氣風發前去賣弄一番。時間長了，整個村子的孩子都開始找上門來。你只得苦眉皺臉地挨個兒去幫人家劈柴。
502232=Mother teaches you to cook, but you have to keep playing with the spatula. Mother scolds you, and you run around the house holding the spatula. If you can't catch you, the mother goes to file a complaint with the father. Father doesn't care about three or seventy-one, he just grabs you and hits him. Then he finds a broken spatula to insert behind you and asks you to plead with your mother.
502240=母親教你做飯，你偏要拿著鍋鏟耍個不停。母親訓斥你，你便抱著鍋鏟滿屋子跑。抓你不著，母親去向父親告狀。父親可不管三七二十一，抓起你就是一頓打，接著找個壞了的鍋鏟插在你背後，讓你去向母親負荊請罪。
502256=You have always loved to hear stories about heroes from booksellers. I also often imagined that I would be a chivalrous man like him, hitting invincible hands all over the world with a single Spear. Later, you came in with a wooden stick from nowhere, tied a chopsticks on your head, and used it as a Spear all day long.
502264=你一直都愛聽說書人講的關於英雄的故事。也常常幻想自己會像他一樣行俠仗義，一杆槍打遍天下無敵手。後來你不知從何處順來了根木棍，頂頭綁上一根筷子，整天當做槍來使。
502280=You are more adept at using a variety of weapons against enemies than martial arts. No matter what weapon, you can easily understand it and progress quickly.
502288=比起拳腳功夫，你更擅長使用各種各樣的武器對抗敵人，無論是哪一種武器你都能夠輕鬆上手，而且進步飛快。
502304=Your understanding of fist and palm techniques is different from normal people. You are not bound to traditional moves and know how to make up for the shortcomings in fist and palm techniques. When you combine these two stances together, they  explode with greater power.
502312=你對拳法與掌法的理解與常人有所不同，你不拘泥于傳統的招式，更懂得在拳法與掌法之中取長補短。當你將這兩種招式組合在一起時，會爆發出更大的威力。
502328=You stumble upon the different yet similar aspects of Spear and Finger techniques in the process of learning martial arts. Combining the two often makes it difficult for your enemies to fight you. You can use your spear as a finger, or your finger as a spear, and your fighting style is so varied that it is frightening.
502336=你在學武的過程中偶然發現了槍法與指法的不同而又相通之處，將兩者結合後的招式往往讓敵人難以招架。以槍為指，也可以指為槍，打法多變，令人膽寒。
502352=When you were young, you had seen two legendary swordsmen fight fiercely on the same stage for the title of number one. At that moment you understood that the sword will be the love of your life.
502360=你幼時曾見過兩位傳奇劍聖為了第一的名號同台展開激烈的較量。此時你便已經明白，劍將會是你一生的摯愛。
502376=You have been raised by wolves since you were a child, and life in the jungle gives you great fist and speed, but you don't seem to be very attractive.
502384=你自幼被狼養大，叢林生活讓你的拳腳功夫和速度了得，不過你似乎不怎麼招人喜歡。
502400=As the son of the contemporary sword god, he has a good talent for swordsmanship. Coupled with the influence of your elders all the year round, your skills in swordsmanship are much higher than those of your peers.
502408=身為當代劍神之子，本身就有著不俗的劍法天賦。加上常年受到長輩的影響，你在劍法上的造詣比同齡人要高出許多。
502424=As the son of a contemporary sword god, he himself has a good talent for swordsmanship. Coupled with the influence of your elders all the year round, your knowledge of sword skills is much higher than that of your peers.

502456=身為當代槍神之子，本身就有著不俗的槍法天賦。加上常年受到長輩的影響，你在槍法上的造詣比同齡人要高出許多。
502472=You were once the 7th son of 7 sons born to a demonic power. Due to the joint exclusion and false accusation by several older brothers, this demonic power became furious and drove you out of the family, and you have been at odds with the Demonic path ever since.
502480=你曾經是一位魔道大能生出的7子中的第7子，由於被幾位兄長聯合排擠、誣陷，導致這位魔道大能大怒，將你趕出家門，你從此與魔道勢不兩立。
502496=You were once an elite disciple of the Just sects with superior talent, but as your sect gradually grew, other Just sects felt threatened. In the end, your sect was destroyed from a siege of other Just sects. You survived, and have been harboring hatred towards them ever since!
502504=你曾經是正道門派中資質上乘的精英弟子，由於你的師門逐步壯大，讓其他正道門派都感到了威脅。最終你的師門在其他正道門派的圍剿中覆滅，你苟活了下來，並與他們勢不兩立！
502520=When you were born, there was lightning and thunder. It seems that this indicates that you have an unusual control over the thunder element.
502528=你出生的時候，電閃雷鳴。似乎這已經預示了你對雷元素有著不一般的掌控力。
502544=When you were born, the mountain fell and the ground cracked. It seems that this indicates that you have an unusual control over the earth element.
502552=你出生的時候，山崩地裂。似乎這已經預示了你對土元素有著不一般的掌控力。
502568=When you were born, there were fires everywhere in the village. It seems that this indicates that you have an unusual control over the fire element.
502576=你出生的時候，村裡到處起火。似乎這已經預示了你對火元素有著不一般的掌控力。
502592=When you were born, there was a heavy rain. It seems that this indicates that you have an unusual control over the water element.
502600=你出生的時候，暴雨如注。似乎這已經預示了你對水元素有著不一般的掌控力。
502616=When you were born, there was a strong wind. It seems that this indicates that you have an unusual control over the wind element.
502624=你出生的時候，狂風大作。似乎這已經預示了你對風元素有著不一般的掌控力。
502640=When you were born, the fragrance of flowers overflowed. It seems that this indicates that you have an unusual control over the wood element.
502648=你出生的時候，花香四溢。似乎這已經預示了你對木元素有著不一般的掌控力。
502664=This is a very strange thing. You have been struck by lightning several times, but except for your hair, everything else is intact.
502672=這是一件很奇怪的事，你被雷擊過好幾次，但是居然除了頭髮沒了，其它地方都完好無損。
502688=You have been burned by fire several times, but not once. And it seems to be stronger.
502696=你被火燒過好幾次，可是一次都沒有燒傷。而且似乎變得更強壯了。
502712=When you were very young, you would swim and hold your breath, and hold back for a long time.
502720=你很小的時候就會游泳閉氣，而且一憋就憋半天。
502736=Your grandfather said that the ancestral house was not very good in Feng Shui, and there was no mountain behind the house. So you did an amazing thing, you spent three years digging and pushing a hill.
502744=你爺爺說祖屋風水不太好，屋後沒有山。於是你幹了一件驚人的事，你用三年挖土推了個小山。
502760=In order to let your brother eat all kinds of fruits, you plant a lot of fruit trees in front of and behind the house. And each one grows amazingly.
502768=為了能讓弟弟吃上各種水果，你在屋前屋後種植了大量的果樹。而且每一棵都長勢驚人。
502784=The child with the same wind is talking about you, and when you run up, it seems to be as flowing as the wind.
502792=風一樣的孩子，說的就是你，你跑起來的時候似乎與風一樣飄逸。
502808=During the thunderstorm, the neighbor's children were still crying, but you were inexplicably excited about every thunder. Until one time when you stood on the top of a mountain, you were finally hit by a bolt of thunder-your hairstyle turned into an explosive head.
502816=雷雨滂沱之時，鄰居家的小孩尚在哭哭啼啼，你卻對每一次雷鳴興奮莫名。直到有一次你站在山巔之上，終於被一道雷霆打中——你的髮型變成了爆炸頭。
502832=Flint is never a precious thing, but you always take him by your side. When you are bored, take it out and hit it, and the flashing sparks will continue to pluck your heartstrings. Although parents have been telling you that children will wet the bed when they play with fire, but you just can't stop.
502840=火石從來不是什麼貴重之物，你卻時刻把他帶在身邊。無聊的時候拿出來打一打，撲閃的火花便不斷撥動著你的心弦。雖然父母一直告誡你說，小孩玩火會尿床，但你就是停不下來。
502856=You are recognized in the village as being good at water. Whenever it is hot and dry in June, you should ask the children in the village who knows how to water to play in the streams and rivers all day long. After a long time, everyone will recognize you as the boss.
502864=你是村裡公認的善於水性。每逢六月旱熱之際，你就叫上村裡的會水的孩子，整天去溪水河流裡玩水。時間長了，大家都認你當老大。
502880=If it weren't for the fact that there is a piece of clothing made of animal skins at home that is solid and tight, the family will never allow you to lie on the ground and roll around all day long. But there is no way, you just like the land under your feet so much, even if you roll over the dust all over the day, you still have no idea.
502888=如果不是因為家裡有一件獸皮製成的衣物，扎實的緊，家裡人也絕不會允許你一天到晚躺在地上滾來滾去。但是沒辦法，你就是那麼喜歡腳下的土地，哪怕滾過一天渾身塵土，你也意猶未盡。
502904=You have never cared about jokes because there are a bunch of potted plants waiting for you to take care of. Waking up every day under the shade of the greenery is your greatest enjoyment. Sometimes one or two children in the pots of vegetation are madly crashed, and you will kick that child out viciously.
502912=你對於玩鬧之事一直不上心，因為家裡有一堆盆植等著你去打理。每天在綠蔭遮蔽下醒來是你最大的享受。有時候一兩株盆植被小孩瘋鬧撞壞了，你就會惡狠狠地把那個孩子給踹出去。
502928=When you were young, your father personally pasted up a paper kite and gave it to you. From then on, your life cannot be separated from the kite. 502936=小時候你的父親親自糊了一個紙風箏送給你，從那以後你的生活就離不開風箏相伴。每當放飛紙鳶之時，你的心也跟著飄到了九霄之外。有一個夢想你一直埋在心裡，從未和任何人述說——你想像風箏一樣翱翔于藍天。
502952=Wind and thunder are the power of the Heavenly Dao. You have had an unusual comprehension of these two powers since birth. Under the influence of these two powers, you have a little more righteousness between your eyebrows.
502960=風力與雷力是天道的力量，而你卻自出生以來，就對這兩種力量有不一般的領悟力。在這兩種力量的影響下，你眉宇之間，多了點正氣。
502976=Earth and wood are the powers of the Earth. You have had an unusual comprehension of these two forces since you were born. Under the influence of these two powers, you have a little more righteousness between your eyebrows.
502984=土力與木力是地道的力量，而你卻自出生以來，就對這兩種力量有不一般的領悟力。在這兩種力量的影響下，你眉宇之間，多了點正氣。
503000=When wind and fire are combined, they devour everything. Two terrifying powers that you, however, can easily master. Influenced by this power, you have a little more devilish energy between your eyebrows.
503008=當風與火結合後，就會吞噬一切，這兩種恐怖的力量，你卻可以輕鬆掌握。受這種力量的影響，你的眉宇之間，多了點魔氣。

503032=當土與水結合後，就會淹沒一切，這兩種恐怖的力量，你卻可以輕鬆掌握。受這種力量的影響，你的眉宇之間，多了點魔氣。
503048=Heaven has three talents, wind, thunder, fire; you were born with a mastery of these three energies beyond mortals.

503128=天生心力專一，精神集中，觀察入微，禦物如神，可以更好的使用法寶、丹藥。但是對於天地六靈根卻比常人更難掌控。

503320=你很小的時候曾經跟著一位仙人學過煉丹，這件事足夠你吹上一輩子。但是因為那時實在太小，你對煉丹之法早就忘了大半，僅比外行多一些淺薄的認識。

503608=你的悟性可以用前無古人，後無來者來形容。這種絕頂的智力，讓你心情難有波動。然而由於你過於聰慧，別人似乎不喜歡與你相處。

503968=你曾經得到過，一本叫做二泉映月的歌譜，你從中感受到了人生的辛酸，獲得了智慧與許多感悟

504016=你是當年領袖了正道勢力抗爭邪祟，並且守護了無數人的英雄傳人。即便你從很小的時候就再也沒見過他，但是他的英雄氣概以及功法傳承依然伴隨你至今。
504032=As an outer disciple of the world's most mysterious sect, Ghost Valley, your talent is different from ordinary!
504040=身為世上最神秘門派鬼穀的外門弟子，你的天賦異于常人！
504056=When you were born, you had a piece of jade in your mouth, and when you look closely, it turned out to be a jade fox. The elders said that you still have the unyielding fate in your previous life.
504064=你生下來的時候，口中銜著一塊玉，仔細一看，居然是一隻玉佩狐狸。長老說你還有前世有未了的緣分。
504080=When you were born, there were a lot of scales on your body. Some people in the surrounding villages who don't know you think you are the reincarnation of a monster, and some say that you are a god descending to the world. What is the reason?
504088=你生下來的時候，身上長了很多鱗片，周邊村裡不知所以的人們有的以為你是妖物轉世，有的說你是神仙下凡，究竟是什麼原因呢？
504104=When you were born, the palm of your hand was very thick, it seemed like the palm of a bear, and it was so powerful. What could be the reason for this?
504112=你生下來的時候，手掌就特別厚，似乎像極了熊的手掌，而且力量奇大。這會是什麼原因呢？

504136=據說你的祖上曾入仙界遊歷，並留下了一個物件。你稍長大後，族長傳給了你。

504160=命運總是很奇特，你小時候玩泥巴，結果在泥巴裡找到了一個帶有神秘氣息的物件，你不知道是什麼，但是卻一直小心亦亦的收在身上。
504176=Because you were born in a martial arts family. It is said that your ancestors also entered the immortal world. So you learned martial arts since you were a kid, and when you were a little older, the patriarch gave you a copy of martial arts from the family.
504184=因為你生在一個武學世家。據說你的祖上也曾入仙界。所以你從小習武，在你稍長大後，族長給了你一本家傳武學。
504200=You once met an old man with a white beard under a big tree. He said that you have excellent roots and want to accept you as a disciple, but you are unwilling. Reluctantly, he gave you a secret book and said that he would be destined to see you later. But you never understand.
504208=你曾經在一棵大樹下遇到一個白鬍子老頭，他說你根骨極佳，要收你為徒，可是你卻不願意，無奈下他給了你一本秘笈，說以後有緣再見，不過你一直看不懂。
504224=It's actually a good thing to have money at home. 504232=家裡有錢，其實也是個挺不錯的事情。你早就嚮往修真飛升，聽說修真界是使用靈石的，所以千方百計在黑市，化了幾十塊大金餅換了些閃閃發光的石頭，也不知道是真是假。
504248=When you were a teenager, you fell into a blessed place and accidentally obtained a bunch of gleaming gems, but you never knew what it was useful for.
504256=你少年時，掉進了一處洞天福地，無意中獲得一堆看上去閃閃發光的寶石，但是一直不知道有什麼用處。
504272=When you were a teenager, you fell into a blessed place and accidentally obtained a bunch of things that looked a little powerful. 504280=你少年時，掉進了一處洞天福地，無意中獲得一堆看上去有點厲害的東西。至今你也沒搞清到底有什麼用。
504296=When you were a teenager, you fell into a cave and inadvertently obtained a bunch of things that looked particularly powerful. To this day you have not figured out what they are used for.
504304=你少年時，掉進了一處洞天福地，無意中獲得一堆看上去特別厲害的東西。至今你也沒搞清到底有什麼用。

504328=在你很小的時候，家族就給你指定了一門親事。而且還在你的脖子上系了一枚老舊的戒指。偶然的一天，你發現這個戒指裡面居然可以裝東西。

504352=曾經在夢中你見到一位與你同齡的仙子，她送了一枚戒指給你。醒來後，發現戒指真的就戴在手上。偶然的一天，你發現這個戒指裡面可以裝東西。

504416=When you were born, you had a lot of visions, and the world changed color. When you were young, you were too strong, no one was your opponent. And as an adult, you were more than capable of pulling out a weeping willow. Your fame has spread to the four fields and eight villages.
504424=你剛出生時異象頻生，天地變色。幼時便氣力過人，沒人是你的對手，成年後更是力能扛鼎，倒拔垂柳。名聲傳遍四野八鄉。
504440=No one knows where you came from, except that the golden bloodline flowing in your body is a constant reminder that you are different from ordinary people. 504496=你是一個可憐的孩子，父母都在匪患中逝世，生存成了你最大的問題。那天，你從懸崖上跳了下去，決定離開這個世界。然而不知是幸運還是不幸，你被一個隱居穀底的魔修救了下來。從此你便拜他為師，跟著他學習六道輪回之法。決心殺盡世間該殺之人。
504512=Your ancestors passed on to you the method of catching corpses, and you often dig people's graves at night in order to practice it. Sometimes you are found by people and run away. 504520=祖輩傳給你趕屍之法，你為了練習此法，經常夜裡去掘人墳墓。有時候被人發現了便倉皇出逃。久而久之，很多人都知道有一個喜歡夜裡掘墓的小孩子，他們開始口口相傳關於你的恐怖故事。趕屍道童的稱號便也舉世皆知。

504568=北域之靈，化生人形，世人稱之為魔嬰。據傳魔嬰所到之處，生人喪命，流血漂櫓。幸好他們並不知道你就是那個傳說中的魔嬰。世人所傳皆是謠言，你只知道因為小時候在世人前展現過神通，自己這一生已經難以平凡度過。
504584=The day the Koi leaps the Dragon Gate is when it transforms into a person. Your natural luck allows you to often turn misfortune into fortune. 504592=錦鯉躍龍門之日，便是你修成人身之時。天生的氣運讓你經常逢凶化吉。然而，若不是你生的俊美，惹人注意，可能禍事還不會太早降臨到你的頭上。一個仙家宗門看穿了你的出身，並且想要奪取你的肉身煉化金丹。
504608=The people of Honghu are all ambitious people with pride in their chests. 504800=There are rumors in the shop that the chasing wind sword arrives and the head falls. This is not a lie in your hands. 504808=坊間傳聞道，追風劍至，人頭落地。這在你的手裡並非虛言。一柄寶劍追風，讓你成為了他人眼裡死神的代名詞。雖然嗜殺不應是習武之人的習慣。但你常常歎息世間奸惡陰險之徒實多，立下決心自己雖一人一劍，也定要見一個殺一個。

504832=龍槍鋒銳無堅不摧，一如使槍之徒肝膽赤心無惡不除。有人說這世道變了，變得小人橫行奸臣當道。手握龍槍之人雖不屑流於世俗，但每當雷鳴龍降之刻，便是污濁洗淨之時。

504856=因為家鄉被戰亂摧毀，你跟著眾人四處逃難。尚未脫離苦海，日漸猖獗的匪患又成了眾人最大的擔憂。在一次又一次的洗劫中，無數冤魂四散紛飛，可搶劫你們的匪徒卻越來越少。同行的人紛紛望著你後背，滿是敬畏與激動。魔刀之名，便也在亡命之徒的嘴裡愈發恐怖。
504872=Stable as a rock and as heavy as Mount Tai is the highest evaluation of you from outsiders. A good fist is enough to rank among the best even in the arena. 504880=穩如石磐，重如泰山是外人對你最高的評價。一身了得的拳腳功夫哪怕在江湖上也足以名列前茅。但是正所謂過剛易折，也有不少人暗地裡想要暗算你這尊不動明王。雖然迄今為止無人成功。但是未來的事情，誰又說得准呢。

505016=Nine days of thunder, read to Dian Da. There is nothing that a stout lightning bolt can't burst, if there are two.
505024=九天雷動，念至電達。沒有什麼是一根粗壯的閃電炸裂不了的，如果有，就兩根。

505048=蝕體魔電，極紫雷光。時常沐浴在狂暴的閃電之中，你唯有感到神清氣爽，力量無窮。
505064=The blazing Yuanyang burned all the common people. The most terrifying weapon at this time is the companion that always accompanies you. Whenever the road sees unevenness, it will ignite a prairie fire, leaving only a place of carbonized dead objects scattered in all directions.
505072=熾火元陽，焚盡蒼生。這時間最可怖的武器，卻是常伴你身的夥伴。但凡路見不平，必將熾火燎原，只留下一地碳化的死物四散紛飛盡。
505088=Nether Earthfire, the Yin Fury that devours people. Often you wake up at night and find yourself sleeping in a pile of extinguished fires. The slightly cool air makes you feel uncomfortable. When the Earthfire ignites from within even the wind is banished far away.
505096=幽冥地火，陰煞噬人。經常夜裡醒來，你發現自己是睡在一堆熄滅的火堆裡。微涼的空氣讓你不太舒服。當地火從焦炭的內心燃起之時，哪怕是風也被驅逐遠去。
505112=Hundreds of rivers, endless waves. The great flood that swallows the mountains and rivers is the chief culprit to destroy your family, but it also allows you to bathe in new life. 505120=瀚海百川，無盡波濤。氣吞山河之勢的大洪水是摧毀你家族的罪魁禍首，卻又讓你沐浴新生。當你發現自己能如臂使指驅使這般偉力，似乎再大的山川，也擋不住這無盡碧波。
505136=The quiet water is a constant stream, hitting the rocks relentlessly. Your biggest childhood hobby was to soak in water all day long and enjoy a rare coolness in the hot summer. But one day you drifted, and drifted, and got lost, but when you discovered that you could breathe underwater, it was as if a door to a new world had opened.
505144=幽水恒流，水打石穿。你童年最大的愛好就是整天泡在水裡，享受炎夏少有的清涼。但是有一天你飄著飄著就迷路了，當你發現你能在水下呼吸時，仿佛打開了了一扇新世界的大門。
505160=The extreme north cold wind screams up to the gods. You have seen a lot of winds in the Northern Territory, no matter how big it is, it is not as big as the one in front of you. The wind howled sharply, breaking gold and iron. But you walked into the center of it unscathed, feeling as if you were one with the wind.
505168=極北寒風，嘯達天神。北域的風你見過不少，再大也不若眼前的這支。風嘯犀利，斷金裂鐵。但是你毫髮無損地走進它的中心，感覺自己仿佛和這狂風融為一體，不分彼此。
505184=The wind of the wilderness is sad and desolate. When you touch the sadness in the wind of late autumn, the spirit of this wind dives into your body, and the wind flows as far as your eyes can see.
505192=曠野之風，悲涼若絕。當你從深秋的風裡觸摸到悲意時，這絲絲風之靈便潛入你的體內，你目之所及，風流不息。
505208=The imperial soil is kind, and the Buda has four poles. As you travel around the world, the ground beneath your feet makes you no longer insecure. The sky is the quilt and the ground is the bed. Your whole body exudes the atmosphere of Houhuang Earth, broad and honest, weighing more than a thousand catties.
505216=皇土仁厚，布達四極。雲遊天下之際，腳下的大地讓你不再居無定所。天為被，地為床。你渾身都散發出後煌之土的氣息，寬廣敦厚，重逾千斤。
505232=The dust accumulates energy, and it washes all directions. Walking on the land for many years, you no longer think that the earth is inferior and spiritless. In the dead of night, when you sleep on the ground, you feel the quiet and heavy ground beneath you. Opening your eyes, you are buried deep underground, but you breathe as usual.
505240=塵土蘊氣，靈滌八方。長年行走在土地上，你不再認為土卑無靈。夜深人靜之時，你睡在地上，感受到自己身下的大地安靜而厚重。睜開雙眼，你已深埋地下，卻呼吸如常。
505256=Unparalleled wood spirits, all in all directions. You fall in love with that piece of forest, but what makes you distressed is that as long as you touch the tree, there will always be a few that will wither faster. Over time, there are no more living trees in the entire ancient forest, and you also lose that piece of forest.
505264=絕生木靈，森羅萬象。你愛上了那片森林，可讓你苦惱的是，只要你觸摸過的樹，總有那麼幾顆會加速枯萎。久而久之，整片古樹林再無活木，你也失去了那片森林。
505280=The old vines have their own way, and the dead trees meet in spring. Before you were born, your hometown relied on farming for a living. After you were born, your hometown began to sell timber. No matter what, the spiritual wood grows endlessly and fells endlessly.
505288=古藤有道，枯木逢春。在你出生前，你的家鄉以種田為生。而你出生後，你的家鄉開始賣起了木材。無它，靈木瘋長，伐之不絕。
505304=While crossing the road, you were killed in a car accident, but your soul was inexplicably attached to a child in this world. When you get along with the people in the village, you show greatness from time to time, and you are well-known for some strange mantras.
505312=在過馬路的時候，你遭遇車禍不幸喪生，靈魂卻莫名其妙附身到這個世界一個孩童的身上。你在與村裡人相處的過程中時時展露不凡，並且因為一些奇怪的口頭禪被人熟知。
505328=You have been born in a paradise since you were a child. Whenever you play in the water or run between the trees, there is always a faint throbbing feeling in your body. No one knows what this means.
505336=從小你就出生在一個世外桃源，青山綠水相伴為樂。每當你在水裡嬉戲或是奔走于林木之間時，體內總有隱隱約約的悸動感。誰也不知道這究竟意味著什麼。
505352=What is different from others is that you like stormy weather the most. You feel sincerely comfortable when the wind is blowing and raining on you. But you are very afraid of thunderstorms, because the roar of thunder can always scare you.
505360=和別人不一樣的是，你最喜歡暴風雨天氣，狂風卷著雨點打在你身上的時候，你感到由衷的舒適。但你又很害怕雷雨天氣，因為轟鳴的雷聲總是能嚇得你肝膽俱顫。
505376=When sitting by the campfire, you don't want to go anywhere. The warm flame will always make you feel comfortable. When a gust of wind hits. The wind assisted the fire to make the bonfire jump out of the tongue, your body trembles involuntarily, and the wind and fire start to emerge in your mind.
505384=坐在篝火旁時，你就哪兒也不想去。溫熱的火焰總能讓你通體舒泰。當一陣疾風襲來。風助火勢讓篝火躍出火舌，你的身體不由自主顫動了起來，腦海裡不由得浮現出風火燎原之勢。
505400=You have been very interested in gadgets such as firecrackers and firecrackers since you were young. In the children's team, you are the king of children who can't tolerate sand. A fiery temper makes you do everything you can, and long-term exercise will make your body stronger.
505408=你從小就對爆竹炮仗之類的小玩意十分感興趣，在小孩子團隊裡，你是眼裡容不得沙子的孩子王。火爆的脾氣讓你做什麼都雷厲風行，長期堅持鍛煉也讓你身體愈加強壯。
505424=In the village, you are the most honest and honest, which makes others always point and call you. But no matter what you do, you are focused and meticulous. This makes you gradually become bold and careful, and more and more respected by everyone.
505432=在村子裡，你是最敦厚老實的那個，這使得別人總是對你指手畫腳，呼來喚去。但你不管做什麼事都是專心致志，細緻入微。這讓你逐漸變得膽大心細，也越來越受到大家的尊重。
505448=You were driven out of the gate by an unscrupulous sect because you overturned the colored glass cup. You have used magical power to kill a few mortals in the village under the sect's indignation, and you have absconded under the sect's order to kill.
505456=由於打翻了琉璃盞，你被一家無良教派趕出山門。你憤憤不平使出神通殺了教派治下村莊的幾個凡人，並且在教派的追殺令下潛逃至今。
505472=You are a nerd, and the biggest hobby of your life is to write books and discuss the Tao. Although years of accumulation have given you a lot of experience in cultivating immortality, long-term lack of exercise also makes you weaker.
505480=你是一個書呆子，平生最大的愛好就是品書論道。雖然多年的積累讓你在修仙感悟上有了不少心得，但是長時間的缺乏鍛煉也讓你體質較弱。
505496=Towering old trees appeared when you were born. Your skin was like an old tree bark, wrinkled everywhere, so you were disliked by various people, but the bark-like skin also gave you good defense, wood spirit and power. A kind heart.
505504=出生時浮現出參天古樹，你一出生皮膚宛如古樹皮一般，處處皺褶，因此你被人各種嫌棄，但是樹皮一般的皮膚也給了你不俗的防禦力，木靈力和一顆善良的心。
505520=You have the blood of a dragon, and the natural strength and endurance are stronger than ordinary people, and it seems that you are luckier than others.
505528=你有著龍的血脈，天生力氣和耐打能力就此一般人強，而且似乎你比別人幸運一些。

505552=你有著鳳的血脈，天生力量就比一般人要強大，而且似乎你要比別人幸運得多。

505648=在有龍脈之地會受天地氣運護體，龍脈護體作為一國之君或宗門之首，麾下子民，弟子，都會收到庇護，受到龍神庇佑。

505928=After some experience in the Eight Desolates Mountain and Sea Realm, you seem to have been recognized by that mysterious sect. Although you never knew where this sect was.

505952=A gentleman who is gentle and moist as jade; You are the most perfect look in everyone's hearts, and the object of many people's secret fantasies. Viewing the texts in the book pavilion every day, your temperament is incomparable, but your body is a little weak.
505960=翩翩君子，溫潤如玉；守拙歸樸，抱元求真。你是所有人心裡最完美的樣子，也是許多人暗地裡幻想的物件。每日觀文於書閣之中，你的氣質無以倫比，身子骨卻有些羸弱。
505976=A gentleman is gentle and moist as jade; there is a father in the family, and he is called the father of the king. A large and strong figure is enough to make you qualified for the hard work at home.
505984=翩翩君子，溫潤如玉；家有父，人稱君父。作為國民岳父的你雖然沒有孩子那麼年輕俊美，卻也是身姿挺拔，氣質不凡。寬大而健壯的身材足以讓你勝任家裡的苦力活。
506000=In a world where there is no other half, you are happy. This also attracts down-and-coming people around you to give you enthusiastic eyes.
506008=在沒有另一半的世界裡，你過得很快樂。這也吸引著你身邊的落魄之人向你投遞出熱情的眼神。
506024=You once frightened a donkey to death by shouting. This also makes your opposite sex relationship not very good, after all, no one wants to stay with a loudspeaker all day. But all over the world know your prestige, and everyone has a consensus that no one can provoke you, otherwise the ears will suffer.
506032=你曾大聲暴喝嚇死了一頭驢。這也讓你的異性緣並不太好，畢竟沒有誰願意整天和一個擴音喇叭待在一起。但是十裡八鄉皆知你的威名，大家都有一個共識，惹誰也不能惹你，否則耳朵就得遭殃。
506048=You have been a left-handed since childhood, but you have not acted too differently. My mother told you that left-handed people are smarter than ordinary people, and you think that is indeed the case. But it seems that others don't think so.
506056=你從小就是一個左撇子，但是你並沒有表現得太與眾不同。母親跟你說左撇子比常人更聰明，你覺得確實是這麼一回事。但是似乎其他人並不這麼認為。

506080=你喜歡雲遊天下，這幫你積累了大量的人脈；而你那因為見多識廣而磨礪出來的一種出塵的氣質，常常讓別人喜歡與你多聊幾句。
506096=Everyone thought you were the great-grandson of the Destiny, and you must be lucky, but unfortunate things often happen to you...

506216=You almost think that everyone in the world is blind except yourself. 506224=你差點就認為世界上除了你自己，所有人都是瞎子。你能看到常人所不能看到的細節，你能夠看到隔壁小鎮酒館磚牆上的螞蟻窩，也能夠看清天空中燕雀的髮型。在戰鬥中，你更容易看清敵人的弱點。

506368=你非常幸運，因為你擁有一個對你至死不渝的青梅竹馬。你們發誓不管遇到多大的磨難都絕不會拋棄對方。你們一起經歷過生死，一起享受過富貴，今後也將並肩繼續前行。

508096=三人走後你來到他們戰鬥的地方，發現道人召喚鬼將的那面幡靜靜地躺在地上，可能是道人受傷時掉落的，你撿起幡快步離去。

508112=沖天的血光之氣令人不寒而慄，凝重的妖氣更是危險的信號，所有一切都在警告你離開，你掉轉方向迅速離去…

508128=停留觀望
508136=Unknown blood

508472=After a few days of driving, you are tired and you want to find a place to rest, but there are only mountains and green water nearby, no one is inhabited. Just when you were about to give up, a lantern seemed to light up in front of you.
508480=趕了幾天的路，疲倦的你想找個地方休息，可這附近只有高山綠水，杳無人煙。就在你準備放棄時，前方似乎亮起了一盞燈籠。
508488=The more you think about it, the more things are wrong, even though you are tired, you quickly leave this area.
508496=你越想越不對勁，儘管疲憊還是快速離開了這片區域。
508504=You walked towards the lantern, approached and saw a small house with a lantern hanging outside the door, the door was hidden, and the plaque of "Shimengzhai" hung on the door.
508512=你向著燈籠走去，走近前去看到一間小屋，門外掛著一盞燈籠，房門虛掩，門上掛著“詩夢齋”的牌匾。
508520=There seems to be the sound of women playing around in the door, and it also seems to be the sound of women talking and laughing.
508528=門內似傳來女子嬉鬧之聲，又似傳來女子談笑之聲。
508536=Suddenly the lantern goes out, and a stray wind strikes you.
508544=突然燈籠熄滅，一陣陰風向你襲來。
508552=You demolished the haunted house, found some valuables and a few pills, and left.
508560=你拆掉鬼屋，找到了一點值錢的東西和幾個丹藥就離開了。
508568=You lost to the female ghost and turned around and fled. When you look back, there are some huts in the wild mountains and mountains around you.
508576=你不敵女鬼轉身而逃，等你回頭再看時四周荒山野嶺，哪裡有什麼小屋。
508584=When you enter the house, the chattering and laughter come to an abrupt end, everything returns to calm, and the whole house is empty. There is only a light in the direction of the guest room, which seems to be guiding you.
508592=你進到屋內，嬉鬧之聲談笑之聲戛然而止，一切恢復平靜，左右四顧整個屋子空無一人，只有客室方向有一盞燈亮著，似乎在指引你。
508600=I followed the lights to the guest room, I saw that there was a soup on the table that gave off a burst of fragrance. After you were hungry and gobbled up, the tiredness of the past few days of travel hit you, and you had a dream in a daze.
508608=順著燈光來到客室，只見桌上已備有一湯發出陣陣香味，饑腸轆轆的你狼吞虎嚥吃完後，連日來旅途的疲倦向你襲來，你迷迷糊糊做了一個夢。
508624= Her name is Shi Yunqing, and her name is Meng Tianhui. That year, she met her and she also met her.
508632=她叫詩雲卿，她叫夢天慧，那一年，她遇見了她，她也遇見了她。
508640=She smiled happily, joyfully jumped off, chattered endlessly, she was charming, weak Liu Fufeng, and few words.
508648=她巧笑嫣然，歡樂跳脫，喋喋不休，她楚動人，弱柳扶風，少言寡語。
508656=In that year, they loved each other as best friends. In that year, they held their own opinions and argued endlessly.
508664=那一年，她們情為閨蜜，往來不息，那一年，她們各持己見，爭論不休。
508672=In a blink of an eye and humiliation.
508680=轉眼及笄。
508688=That year, she experienced great changes suddenly, her family was ruined, she fell into the dust, and her smile was not there. That year, her matchmaker's words forced her to go to the sedan chair, and her husband and wife were not humorous and depressed.
508696=那一年，她突逢巨變，家破人亡，淪落風塵，笑顏不在，那一年，她媒妁之言，迫上花轎，夫妻不穆，鬱鬱寡歡。
508704=The moon sets and the sun rises, and spring goes for more than a dozen autumns.
508712=月落朝陽升，春去十幾秋。
508720=That year, she washed away the lead and picked up the chrysanthemum fence. That year, she broke free from the shackles, married and separated, and found the way freely.
508728=那一年，她洗盡鉛華，采菊籬下，那一年，她掙脫束縛，夫妻和離，逍遙尋道。
508736=That year, they met again, the green mountains are faint, the green water is long, they live together in a house, and have a dream of poetry.
508744=那一年，她們重逢，青山隱隱，綠水悠悠，結廬同居，齋名詩夢。
508752=You woke up in the morning and found yourself sleeping on a piece of grass. The tiredness of the past few days was gone. When you were on the road, you found that you did not know when there was a mirror on your body.
508760=早上你醒了過來，發現自己睡在一片草地上，連日來的疲倦一掃而空，你上路時發現自己身上不知何時多了一面鏡子。

508920=When passing by a ruin, your sword suddenly flew up, and the tip of the sword seemed to point to the ruin.

508936=You flew to take the sword, retract the sword and scabbard it, but after a while the sword flew again and pointed directly at the ruins.
508944=你飛身取劍，收劍回鞘，可不一會兒劍又飛起，直指廢墟。
508952=The sword seems to have sensed your thoughts, slowly returning to the sheath, falling silent.
508960=劍似乎感應到了你的想法，慢慢回到劍鞘內，歸於沉寂。
508968=You followed the sword's guidance, and in a short while, you came to a fragment of ruined walls. You felt a lot of spiritual energy exuding around it, as if this place was a treasure place for cultivation.
508976=你跟隨劍的指引，不一會兒，來到了一片殘垣斷壁之中，你感到周圍散發著充沛的靈氣，似乎這裡是一處修煉的寶地。
508984=You stay here to meditate and practice. When your practice is completed, the ruins disappear in front of your eyes.

509000=You feel that your cultivation level has improved.
509008=你感到修為提升了。

509408=You pass by a village, and you see that there are only old and young women and children walking in the village, and there is no young man, so you come forward and ask.
509416=你路過一個村落，見村裡只有老幼婦孺行走，無一青年，便上前詢問。
509424=From the villagers, it turns out that all the young men in this village went to an island in a lake not far from the village three years ago, but no one returned.
509432=從村民口中得知，原來此村的青壯男子在三年前盡皆前往離村不遠的一片湖中的小島，卻無一人歸來。
509440=You feel strange and want to ask the villagers, but no one responds to you. At night, a woman came to you secretly.
509448=你覺得奇怪，想向村民打聽，卻無人回應你。到了晚上，一個婦人偷偷來找你。
509456=You only learned from her that hundreds of years ago, the village rescued a Taoist from the lake. After the harvest, the village held a banquet to sacrifice to the gods.
509464=從她口中你才得知，數百年前，村裡從湖邊救回一名道人，村裡豐收後，大擺酒宴祭神。
509472=After the Taoist got drunk, he said that there is a priceless treasure on the small island in the middle of the lake. He was accidentally injured and unconscious when he went to fetch the treasure. When everyone wants to continue to ask, the Taoist finds a gaffe, so he won't say more.
509480=道人喝醉後說，湖中間小島有一無價之寶，他當年就是去取寶物不慎受傷昏迷。大家想要繼續詢問時道人發覺失言，不再多說。
509488=The Taoist drank too much and died of drunkenness the next day. After he was buried, the village organized people to go to the middle of the lake to hunt for treasure, but they found nothing.
509496=次日道人喝酒過多醉酒而亡。將其安葬後村裡組織人前往湖中間尋寶，卻都一無所獲。
509504=Three years ago, fog began to form in the middle of the lake. Someone in the village remembered it again. The young people in the village were looking for treasures together. Unexpectedly, the villagers sent people to look for them and lost their way in the fog.
509512=三年前，湖中間開始起霧，村裡又有人惦記起此事，攛掇村裡青年一起尋寶，怎料這次竟一去不歸，村人派人尋找皆於霧中迷失方向。
509520=Women, please find your missing relatives.
509528=婦人拜託你找回失蹤的親人。
509536=You packed your luggage and left the village overnight.
509544=你收拾行李，連夜離開了村莊。
509552=The next day, a large amount of spiritual stones was collected in the village, asking you to retrieve your missing relatives.
509560=第二天村裡湊了一大筆靈石，請求你找回失蹤的親人。
509568=You sighed...Recall what the woman said.
509576=你歎了口氣…回想婦人說的話。
509584=You follow the direction pointed by the woman and come to the tomb of the Taoist. There is no trace of the tomb for hundreds of years. If it weren't a stone monument, I'm afraid no one would find this tomb.
509592=你順著婦人所指的方位來到道人的墓前，數百年過去這裡早已看不出墳墓的痕跡，若不是一塊石碑，只怕沒有人會發現這座墳墓吧。
509600=You stepped forward to make sacrifices, the Taoist voice offended...
509608=你上前祭祀一番，道聲得罪…
509616=The bones of the Taoist still maintain the posture before death, which seems to confirm your guess...
509624=道人的屍骨還保持著死前的姿態，似乎印證了你的猜測…
509632=You found a square jade on the Taoist's mouth, but a corner was cracked.
509640=你在道人的嘴部位置發現了一枚方玉，卻裂了一個角。
509648="It seems that the Taoist did not reveal the secret of the treasure..."
509656=“看來道人沒有吐露寶物的秘密…”
509664=You come to the lake, thinking that the lake is full of smoke all day long, and mortals will get lost if they enter. There should be an array blocking the way.
509672=你來到湖邊，心想湖心終日煙霧彌漫，凡人入則迷路。應是有陣法阻路。
509680=Looking at the diffuse fog and thinking about unknown dangers, you became more and more scared, and finally quietly left here.
509688=看著彌漫的霧氣想著未知的危險，你越來越害怕，最終悄悄離開了此地。
509696=You came to the lake by boat and threw a handful of ashes into the air. The ashes turned into stars and dots of light, surrounded by the fog.
509704=你乘舟來到湖中，向空中撒了一把靈灰，靈灰化作星星點點的光芒，在霧氣周圍環繞。
509712=You sprinkle a handful every other segment, and finally find in one place, the light is attacking a gap, but it can't penetrate. You rowed in and came to the island in the lake.
509720=你每隔一段撒上一把，終於在一處地方發現，光芒在進攻一處缺口，卻又無法攻入。你蕩舟而入，來到湖中小島。
509728=As soon as you enter the island, you feel the spiritual pressure around you soaring, and you realize that you have stepped into someone else's territory.
509736=剛一進島頓覺周圍靈壓猛增，你意識到自己踏入了別人的領地。
509744=You go back to the village and tell the villagers that their relatives have been killed. You have repeatedly warned not to enter the lake again. Then left here.
509752=你回到村莊，告訴村民他們的親人只怕已經遇難，你再三告誡切不可再入湖中。而後離開了此地。
509760=You read a formula to protect the whole body, and walk carefully into the island. The fog around you is getting thicker and thicker. You follow the guidance of the ashes and walk to the densest place in the island.
509768=你念個口訣護住周身，小心翼翼地往島內走去，周圍霧氣越來越濃，你順著靈灰的指引，往島內靈氣最濃密的地方走去。
509776=Suddenly the ashes wander around like headless flies. I don't know when a black shadow appears behind you in the fog.
509784=突然靈灰如無頭蒼蠅般四處遊蕩，不知何時霧氣中一個黑影出現在你背後。
509792=I can't beat the Yue Jing, suddenly Fang Yu of the Taoist flashed, and you were already in the village when you came back to your senses.
509800=眼看不敵月精，突然身上道人的方玉一閃，你回過神來時已身處村中。
509808=The woman next to you was shocked, and you were still in shock. When you reached out to explore, Fang Yu in the bag had already been broken into pieces. Looking up from a distance, I saw that the fog had spread to the entire lake.
509816=旁邊一女子受驚不淺，你也驚魂未定，伸手去摸索時囊中方玉早已裂成碎片。抬頭遠觀，只見迷霧已擴散至整個湖中。
509824=You lose to Yuejing, fight back to the boat with one last breath, urging the boat to float away in the direction when it came.
509832=你不敵月精，拼著最後一口氣逃回船上，催動小船向來時方向飄走。
509840=When you woke up, you were seriously injured and you don't know where you are.
509848=等你醒過來時身受重傷，不知身在何處。
509856=You secretly rejoice that you met it during the day. If the moon rises at night and the moon's essence sucks its essence, I'm afraid you are no match.
509864=你暗自慶倖是在白天遇到它，若是晚上月亮升起，月精吸食精氣，只怕你也不是對手。
509872=In a different place on the head of the Moon Jing body, a soul pill has fallen out, so take away the soul pill.
509880=月精身首異處，一枚魂丹掉了出來，你收好魂丹。
509888=When you look around, the fog begins to dissipate slowly, and the ashes begin to guide the direction again. Following the guidance, you come to a cave.
509896=舉目四望時霧氣開始慢慢散去，靈灰又開始指引方向，順著指引，你來到一處洞穴。
509904=You shook the folder you carried with you, and found that the cave was covered with bones, I'm afraid it was all the villagers who were killed.
509912=你晃一晃隨身攜帶的摺子，發現洞內白骨皚皚，只怕都是遇難的村民。
509920=In the depths of the cave you found a transparent branch floating in the air.
509928=在洞穴深處你找到了一截浮在空中的透明樹枝。
509936=You go back to the village and tell the villagers that the monster is dead and the location of the villager's bones. The villagers thank you and go to find the bones of their loved ones.
509944=你回到村莊告訴村民怪物已斃及村民屍骨位置，村民向你表示感謝後自去尋找親人屍骨。

509976=數百年前的事情就讓他過去吧，你離開了此地。

509992=你起身去往道士墳墓，路上與一女子相遇，只見女子胸前佩戴一塊方玉與道士所留殊無二致。
510000=You stop the woman and give her the Taoist Fang Yu and the spiritual stone given by the villagers: "This is the trust of the old man..."

510016=The woman looked surprised, and you walked towards the grave without looking back.
510024=女子一臉詫異，你頭也不回地向墳墓方向走去。
510032=Come to the grave.
510040=來到墳前。

510056=你剛一接觸樹枝，一道光亮閃過樹枝就融入你的體內。
510064=You comforted the old woman: "Don't worry, I will find out."
510072=你安慰老婦人道：“你且放心，我會一探究竟。”
510080=This matter is weird, you are conscious that your way is still shallow, but you are afraid that there will be more fortunes...
510088=此事蹊蹺，你自覺道行尚淺只怕凶多吉少…
510096=After listening to the old woman's words, you can't help being silent...but you can't ignore the disappearance of the villagers. The woman didn't see your answer, she retreated thoughtfully and left.
510104=聽完老婦人的話，你不禁默然…但村民失蹤的事你也無法置之不理。婦人未見你應允，若有所思告退後離去。
510112=At dawn the next day, you recall what the woman said.

510128=You came to the tomb of the Taoist priest, worshipped the Taoist priest again and left the village.

510144=You buried a soul pill in the tomb of the Taoist and prepared to leave the village after paying homage to the tomb again.

510160=You left this village after paying homage to the Taoist priest again.
510168=你對道士再次祭拜後離開了這個村莊。
510176=Seeing such a vision, you lift up your breath and speed up, and sprint towards the small town.
510184=看到如此異象，你提氣加速，向著小鎮方向疾行而去。
510192=When he was about to approach the town, he suddenly heard a scolding voice behind him, "Go away from the Demonic Way!" A man in a Chinese robe could not help but attack you.
510200=快要靠近小鎮的時候，突然身後傳來呵斥之聲“妖道休走！”一華袍男子不由分說向你攻來。
510208=Seeing that the man is invincible, a sword screen will force you back, and quickly take the flying sword and escape to the sky. A bumpy stone fell from the man as he fled.
510216=男子眼見不敵，一招劍幕將你逼退後，迅速乘上飛劍向天邊逃去。逃走時一塊坑坑窪窪的石頭從男子身上掉了下來。
510224=You picked up the stone and came to the town, only to see the ruins and shingles in the town, no more anger. You left this place after staying for a while...

512144=“詢問了一位途徑此處的道人方知，原來我十年未曾受過香火，亦未尋找替身解脫，所以會慢慢的回歸天地。但我還有心願未了，今日驚擾不知少俠能否贈我香火。”你聽完決定

513720=The woman's crushed body floated down in the distance, and a soul slowly fell into your hand. You felt your vision become blurred, and vaguely saw tear drops falling on your hand.
513728=女子被擊潰的身體飄落在遠處，一屢神魂緩緩而出落至你手上，你感到視線變得模糊，隱約看見有淚滴滴落在手上。
513736=After a long time, a slight choked whisper comes to your ear: "Don't worry...I won't let you go home empty-handed".
513744=許久後，你耳邊傳來了一絲輕微的哽咽細語：“放心…我不會讓你空手而歸”。
513752=Then, your hands involuntarily tremble. You raise your right hand and press the slightly shaking soul into your forehead.
513760=隨後，你感覺自己被控制的雙手止不住的顫抖，右手抬起，將輕微抖動好似低語的神魂按入額頭。
513768=You know that these two people, whose past you don't know, in the end, dissipated together between the heaven and the earth.
513776=你知道，這兩位不知過去的人兒，終究是一同消散在了這天地之間。
513784=You step forward and ask, "May I ask why Your Excellency took this book away from me?"
513792=你走上前去，詢問道“敢問閣下為何奪走這本書冊？”
513800="Ha, for a tomb raider and treasure hunter, you are so courteous, which is quite laughable." The strange man laughed.
513808=“哈，你這盜墓奪寶之人還這般彬彬有禮，倒也頗引人發笑。”陌生男子笑了起來。
513816=You are ashamed to hear this and with a bitter smile say, "Although the cultivation of Daoism is called heaven-defying, but there are many things one can't do."
513824=你聽罷慚愧萬分，苦笑道“修道雖稱逆天大路，所行卻多身不由己。”
513832=After hearing this, the mysterious man gazed at you for a long time. He shook his head and sighed, throwing the book back at you.
513840=聽罷此言，神秘男子凝視了你許久，而後搖頭歎息，將書冊扔還與你。
513848="There is no choice but to grow old in spite of oneself's will". The mysterious man sighed, turned and started to walk away...
513856=“青山白頭，身不由己，無可奈何，無可奈何”，歎息一番轉身離去…
513864=You saw the man leave, and unknowingly the book in your hand slowly started to fade. Once the book completely dissipated, you felt a slight increase in your own longevity.
513872=你目送男子離去，而不知不覺手中的書冊卻已慢慢消散，等到書冊完全消散以後你感受到自己的壽元略有增加。
513880=You call out to the mysterious man : "May I ask what this Lingding Collection has to do with you?"
513888=你叫住神秘男子“請問這本Lingding Collection與你…有何關係？”
513896=The mysterious man didn't turn around, but he murmured softly, "I just happen to have the same name as the fool who wrote up this poem..." The man's voice faded, and then his figure also disappeared between heaven and earth.
513904=“伶仃集麼…”那神秘男子並未回頭，輕聲呢喃道：“我跟編出這本詩的癡傻蠢人，碰巧同名同姓罷了…”男子聲音漸微，而後同身影也一般消失在天地之間。
513912=You feel a slight increase in your longevity. After keeping still for a moment, you decide it is best to leave this place and continue your journey.
513920=這一刻，你感受到自己的壽元略有增加。你在原地駐足了片刻後，決定還是離去。
513928=You keep silent, wondering what all of this has to do with you, the person who snatched the book. 
513936=你一言不發，心想這又與你這搶奪之人何干？
513944=The mysterious man looks at you, and starts speaking : "Little one, help me do something, and I promise I'll grant you a gift!"
513952=神秘男子打量著你，而後開口“小子，幫我做件事，事後我許你一場造化！”
513960=You ponder this in your mind and ask, "What would you have me do?"
513968=你心中思量起來，詢問“什麼事？”
513976=The mysterious man said, "Come with me and behead an Immortal! Do you dare?"
513984=神秘男子道“與我一路，斬一個登仙！可敢？”
513992=If you want to achieve great fortune, you have to go through great risks. Becoming Immortal means defying Heaven, even simply cultivating Dao is already defying Heaven, so how could you be afraid? What's more, there is this uncommon mysterious man. You raise your head and laugh, "Why wouldn't I dare?"
514000=要得大造化，必渡大風險，登仙雖逆天，但修道本為逆天之事，又何能懼此？何況還有這位不俗的神秘男子。你仰頭大笑道“有何不敢？”
514008=The mysterious man nodded. His figure turned into a silver light and disappeared into the book. You went up to pick up the book and felt an extra stream of foreign intentions in your head.
514016=神秘男子點頭，身影化作銀光遁入書冊之中，你上前拾取書冊，感覺腦海中多了一股他人的意念。
514024=An Immortal is an extraordinary existence. Without knowing this mysterious man's real intentions, would it not be foolish to become confused because of a few words and lose your life? After thinking carefully, you open your mouth and refuse.
514032=登仙一境，已非凡俗，這神秘男子不知底細。若到時候糊裡糊塗地因為幾句話而丟掉了性命，豈非不智？你仔細思索後，開口拒絕。
514040=After you refuse the mysterious man's request, first his face is expressionless, and then he sneers, takes the book and goes away.
514048=神秘男子的請求被你拒絕後，先是面無表情，而後嘲弄一笑，攜書隱去。
514056=You stand frozen in place, not daring to ask for the book back, letting the man leave...
514064=你呆呆站在原地，不敢索回書冊，任由男子離去…
514072=You are sitting in a restaurant drinking alone, when a strange woman suddenly sits opposite you.
514080=你正坐在酒樓裡獨自飲酒休養，這時，一位陌生的女子突然坐在你的對面。
514088=Excuse me little friend，may I ask you a question？
514096=請問小友，不知能否詢問你一個問題？
514104=（Little friend...）You are not happy with this kind of address. You are ready to refuse, but, as soon as you look up, you can see that this woman is an Immortal powerhouse! You swallow all the thoughts in your heart and smile carefully.
514112=（小友…）你心中對於這種稱呼有了些許不快，正準備開口拒絕，一抬頭卻丹田一滯，這位女子，竟是一位登仙大能！心中萬般他念被你咽下喉嚨，你小心笑道。
514120=Senior, please speak freely.
514128=還請前輩詢問便是。

514160=的確在晚輩身上。
514168=It happened that I didn't bring the book with me today...
514176=今天碰巧沒把書帶出來…
514184=Playing such cheap tricks in my presence，you and Chiyu are really similar.
514192=在我面前玩這種蹩腳伎倆，你跟恥玉子還真是臭味相投。
514200=The Immortal woman sneered，but you noticed that concealed beneath the surface she had a look of recalling something.
514208=登仙女子嘲諷一笑，你卻未發現她眼中潛藏的追憶。
514216=She shakes her head and you feel your longevity diminish. At the same time, the Lingding Collection on your body as if recognizing its master comes out and flies to her hand.
514224=她搖了搖頭，你感覺自己的壽元有所減少，同時，你身上的《Lingding Collection》就仿佛認主一般歡悅而出，飛至她手上。
514232=I forgive you, but do not dare to lie in front of me again.
514240=諒你也不敢在我的面前撒謊。
514248=The Immortal woman's face is expressionless. With a barely-visible shake of her right index finger, the Lingding Collection on your body as if recognizing its master comes out and flies to her hand.
514256=登仙女子面無表情，右手食指幾乎不可見地一晃，你身上的《Lingding Collection》就仿佛認主一般歡悅而出，飛至她手上。
514264=The Immortal woman did not read the book, but just looked at the cover of the Lingding Collection, which was weathered by the passing of tens of thousands of years.
514272=登仙女子並沒有翻閱這本詩集，只是看著《Lingding Collection》在歲月雕琢下萬般滄桑的外殼。
